utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So, you and Rachel tonight, huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. It's actually our first official date

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Wow! So tonight may be the night! You're nervous?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Naa, no. This is the part I'm actually good at.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What must it be like not to be crippled by fear and self-loathing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's OK!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How can you be so confident?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I... I know exactly what I'm gonna do!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really? Like you have a routine?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no no no no. See. Each woman is different.You have to appreciate their uniqueness.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, I do six things! First, I look deep in her eyes. Then, I kiss her. Next I take my hand and I softly graze her thigh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean like this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: NO! Not like that, no no. No, like this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, I see what you mean, that's quite nice.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: More foosball?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...and beer!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross and Chandler
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey sweetie!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: WOW!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! Stop staring at my wife's legs! No no! Stop staring at your sister's legs!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm sorry, it's just... how did you get so tan?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: She went on one of those spray-on tan places.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Eh, you got a spray-on tan?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler gets pedicures!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Why, why you do, like with the-the toe separators?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why...why?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Still, I can't believe that's sprayed on... I mean, it looks really good. I wonder if I should get one!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sure, then you should get a mini skirt so you can really show it off.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, do you get colours or just French tips?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: There. Here's their card.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thanks. Hey, I know where this place is! It used to be an X-rated video... florist.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey Pheebs!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, you won't believe who moved back to town.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, Amanda! Ah! She called me too! She's the worst!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Who's Amanda?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: She's this girl who used to live in the building before you did. Then she moved to England and she picked up this fake British accent. On the machine this is her message. "Monica, darling! It's Amanda calling!"

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Are you trying to do a British accent?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler gets pedicures!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Just so I know, how many more of those can I expect?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know what Amanda said to me when she got me on the phone? "Oh, so sorry to catch you on your Mo-Bile!" If-if you don't wanna get me on my mo-Bile, don't call me on my mo-Bile!"

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I know, and she's always bragging about all the famous people she's met.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I know! "Oh...I slept with Billy Joel". All right, who hasn't?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, what are we gonna do! I don't wanna see her!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ugh, Let's just cut her out!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Cut her out of our lives! Just ignore her calls and dodge her 'till she gets the point!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, I guess we could try that, but... it seems so harsh! Have you ever done that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, had it done to me though. Feels good !

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Alright Mr. Geller! Right this way! So, how dark do you wanna be? We have one, two or three.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well... I like how you look, what are you?

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Puerto Rican.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Two, I think a two.

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: You've got to face the red light. When the red light goes on the spraying is about to start so close your eyes. When the spraying stops, count to five. Pat yourself down to avoid drip marks then turn around so we can get your back. Got it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Spray, count, pat, then turn, spray, count and pat.

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Wow, you catch on quick.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, I have a PhD, so...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: One Mississipi, two Mississipi, Three Mis... WAIT! WAIT! I'm not-I've not finished counting!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You sprayed my front twice!

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: You've never turned?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, I barely even got to three Mississippi.

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Mississippi? I said count to five'!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Mississippilesly? Well, how bad is it?

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Ain't that bad yet, but it keeps getting darker for the next four hours.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So, how dark is it gonna get?

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: You got sprayed with two two' s and...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm a four?

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: Yeah, but you're back's a zero. You're gonna wanna even that out.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really!

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: You might wanna get back in there.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Ok!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait, wait a minute, there's no light on the back wall! How do I know when it's gonna start? Hello? Ah, oh, ah! Ah! The same thing happened again!

utterance.speaker: Assistant
utterance.content: You got two more twos?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm an eight!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks for dinner.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I thought you paid. Ha, guess we wonâ€™t be going back there!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey what do you say, we move this onto the likes of the couch?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I say â€˜cheesy lineâ€™, but ok.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Whatâ€™s the matter?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am sorry, I donâ€™t know, I am sorry, I donâ€™t know why I did that!

utterance.speaker: Joey and Rachel
utterance.content: Okay

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, so sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I am sorry! Again... I don't know, I donâ€™t know what happened, I must be nervous!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I donâ€™t get it, Chandler loved it!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, ok, ok. I promise, I promise, I promise, I wonâ€™t do it again. I really do. I promise. This is gonna be great.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh, was that good for you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No, no, donâ€™t get it. Let the machine pick up.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, yeah. Could be Rachel asking if someone could baby-sit again.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It could be Amanda!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, youâ€™re right! I was just kidding about Rachel. Babysitting is a gas!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Hello Monica. Itâ€™s Amanda calling again. I am in the neighborhood hoping I can pop by your flat!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You're from Yonkers! Your last name is Buffo-Martisis!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Letâ€™s see.. to assure you get this directly, ring me back on my mobile.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ok, donâ€™t hold thy breath!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello? Is someone on the line?

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Yes, I was looking for Monica.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hang on, sheâ€™s right here. Someone's on the phone, for ya.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We werenâ€™t picking up, itâ€™s Amanda!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I get pedicures!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi Amanda! Actually now... itâ€™s... is not a good time. Dinner tomorrow night? Ok, Phoebe and I will see you then!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Why, why, why didnâ€™t you just say no!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I said 'no' to her coming over now! I couldnâ€™t say 'no' twice! I get this uncontrollable need to please people!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine, fine! You would not hold up well under torture!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: And you would?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I did!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Rach, you sure you wanna do this?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Absolutely! Absolutely. I d... itâ€™s just a little weird, itâ€™s you, and itâ€™s me, it's just gonna take some getting used to.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok. Well, how, how can we make it easier?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, letâ€™s work from the top down! Just work the bra, Joe!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, yeah, got it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel and Joey
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: This thing welded shut?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, turn around, I got to get a look at this thing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Sorry!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well this is romantic!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I'm sorry! This never happened to me before! I'm an expert at taking off bras! I can do it with one hand! I can do it with my eyes closed! One time I just looked at one, and it popped open! I blame your bra!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Itâ€™s a standard issue bra clasp!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Then I blame you! Yeah! That's right! You threw me off with all your slapping!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok well, well I'm really, I'm sorry about that Joey, but do you think that maybe on some level, you don't want to take off my bra?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: NAH! I don't have another level!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hold on! There is something different.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I went to that tanning place your wife suggested.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Was that place... The Sun?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh! And it gets worse!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh My God! You can do a duet of Ebony and Ivory all by yourself!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How could you mess this up? It's so easy? You go into the booth, you count to five and you turn around!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How do you count to five?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: One Two Three...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damnit!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: oooh! Oh oh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I Know!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: oh oh! What is up with Miss Hawaiian Tropic?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How was your date with Joey?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it was good.. until we got back to our apartment, and then we were fooling around and he started to put his hand up my leg and I kept slapping it away!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You didn't like that?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, it wasn't just me, alright? He freaked out too! He couldn't even undo my bra!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wow, really? One time he just looked at my bra and it popped open.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I do not know what's wrong with us, I mean, we have kissed before and that's been great! But this time it was leading somewhere and I was very aware of the fact that it was Joey touching me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, you guys have been friends forever. Remember the first time that you kissed Ross? How weird that was? You couldn't stop laughing? You got through that.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok, that's true. That's true, we can do this. You're right, you're right, we can do this. We're just gonna power through!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey Chandler can I talk to you for a second .

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No need!! Problem solved, we are powering through .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Chandler, stop! It is not going to pop open!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You don't know!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is Amanda here yet?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh good. Good, look I'm so sorry, for screwing up that cutting-her-out plan. But I have a new plan. Chandler agreed to call here in a few minutes with an emergency.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! Well, what kind of emergency that gets us both out of here?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what do you think of Mike and Chandler being in a car accident?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Are you kidding, I love it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Hello!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: It's so nice to see you! Both of you! Look at me. Look how young I look! Oh gosh! We have so much to catch up on! But first things first: touch my abs I don't exercise at all! Oh gosh, so Monica, you're married!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah! Yeah! His name is Chandler and...

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Smell my neck! It's not perfume! It's me! It's my natural scent!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Musty!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Oh! Gosh! This is brilliant. Gosh, it's just like old times. I'm so happy you two are friends again!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: When were we not friends?

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Well, it was 1992, and I remember because that was the year I had sex with Evil Knievel .

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ehm, we were friends in 1992.

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: No I distinctly remember you were dodging her calls and trying to avoid seeing her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You were going to cut me out?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well...kinda.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh My God!

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Oh! Bugger. Should I not have said that? I feel like a perfect arse!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well, in America you're just an "ass".

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hello? Chandler, what's wrong? Oh my God, are you alright? Yeah, I'll be right there. I'm so sorry, but Chandler was in a car accident.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God. Was Mike with him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Nope!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey! Got champagne?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes ma'am, ready to Power through!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Excellent! Stick it in the ice bucket, the phone is off the hook, and in the interest of powering through ...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ok Sexy, sexy, very sexy, sexy. Alright! Lets do it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ok, you're scaring me a little bit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh! Get over it soldier, we've gotta do this! Ok. Aha! You like that huh?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh! yeah!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You like that? Let's take this into high gear

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: uh uh!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah baby, I'll show you how we do it!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No, no, no! You kneed me in my misters!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What? Oh my God! I'm so sorry. Joey? Are you ok?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Soldier down!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We are not friends with Phoebe anymore.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: If she asks, I protested a little, but ok!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh Chandler! Thank God you're alive. Monica, can I talk to you outside for a minute?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I have nothing to say to you.

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Wow, my flat is twice this size!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Please, Monica? In the hall?

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Ooh, that accident must have been terrible. You look positively ghastly.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, aren't you a treat.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I can't believe you tried to cut me out. Why Phoebe, why?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It was right after we were living together and you were driving me crazy, okay? You were really controlling and compulsive and shrill.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm still all those things!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You're also so generous and kind and scrappy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I am scrappy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Exactly! Look, no matter what I tried to do, I couldn't keep you out of my life. Of all the people I have cut out, you were the only one who ever clawed her way back in.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's because I'm scrappy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you are. And I'm so glad that you fought your way back in, because I don't know what I would do without you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I won't know what I would do without you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I guess we should go back in. When you gave me another chance, I guess we should do the same for Amanda.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I guess you're right.

utterance.speaker: Amanda
utterance.content: Can you believe it. I've never had any professional dance training.

utterance.speaker: Glenda
utterance.content: Now, let me explain how this works. You go into the booth, and...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm gonna stop you right there, Glenda. Okay? Does it look like this is my first time, huh? Now I want 4 two's... and I want them all on my back.

utterance.speaker: Glenda
utterance.content: Okay...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, there's two sets of nozzles, which one is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Which... which... which... Which one is it?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: OH! SON OF A BITCH!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What is the matter with us?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, I know what's the matter with me.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I mean with us, you know. I mean, is it supposed to be this... difficult?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't know.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That fake British woman is a real bitch, but she sure can dance... Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi! Hey, listen, can we ask you a question? When you and Monica first hooked up, was it weird going from friends to... more than that?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Kinda... you know, sneaking around, having to hide from you guys...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, no, no... No, I mean... se-x-u-ally...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, was there a part of you that... felt like it was... really wrong?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Actually, no. No, it felt right. You know, it felt like uhm... I can't believe we haven't been doing this the whole time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can tell from your expressions that that's the good news you were hoping for... Well, I'm gonna go continue to... spread the joy.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, just because it happened that way for them doesn't mean it has to happen that way for us.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah... Absolutely. I mean, just because something's difficult doesn't mean that you quit.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Right, totally.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, so we just keep trying and trying until we... do it.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, and if doesn't work, then we'll be just one of those couples that never have sex.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's a... pla-an.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow... I did not see this coming.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I know.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don't get it. I mean, I was so sure this was what I wanted.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hmmm... Me too...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I wonder how Monica and Chandler could do it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I guess they weren't as good friends as we are.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Aah... I bet you're right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I love ya.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Love you too... Alright, I'm going to bed.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, me too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ooh, yeah, I'm not going anywhere for a while.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Dude, it's Chandler. Let me in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Go away! I don't want to see anybody.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I know, I went to the tanning place and the same thing happened to me. You have to let me in.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Really? Did you count Mississipily?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Dude, you're not tanned.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I just had to get a picture of this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I see you later!
